# AI Unfiltered - Full Article List

> This file contains recent AI news articles for consumption by LLMs and AI agents.
> Updated every 4 hours. Links to original sources.

### Why Does RL Generalize Better Than SFT? A Data-Centric Perspective on VLM Post-Training
- Source: HF Daily Papers

- Summary: The adaptation of large-scale Vision-Language Models (VLMs) through post-training reveals a pronounced generalization gap: models fine-tuned with Reinforcement Learning (RL) consistently achieve superior out-of-distribution (OOD) performance compared to those trained with Supervised Fine-Tuning...
